overview: Surfacing mysteriously after over 30 years, the video footage of Fela and African 70â€™s set at the Berlin Jazz Festival (Berliner Jazztage) in 1978 is a true gift to lovers of Fela and Afrobeat, marking the best quality video/audio and musical performance of Fela to date.
title: Fela Kuti: Berliner Jazztage '78
